title: Pokedex
description: This is the first responsive web app that I created. It retrieves information from an external API and displays it for the user. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in the creation of this app.

title: MyFlix API
description: This project was my initial foray into creating my very own REST API. In this project I used REACT to build a server side component to a Movies Web APP. This project also uses MongoDB as the Database that holds all the movie information.

title: MyFlix Client
description: This project uses REACT to create the client side for a Single Page Application that works with Movie API to display movie information to the user.

title: Meet App
description: This project taught me to use a Test Driven Development approach using REACT to build a serverless, Progressive Web Application. This application uses the Google Calendar API to fetch upcoming events.

title: Chat App
description: This is a Chat App that was built using React Native, Expo, and Google Firestore Database. This app helped me learn and demonstrate my knowledge of Javascript mobile development.

title: MyFlix Angular Client
description: This project was built using Angular and was a recreation of the My Flix Client that used JavaScript.
